name: Trash Beats
description:
Get into the rhythm with Matcha the racoon as you roll, jump, and dash your way to his home! 

4 Disks. 5 Ways to move. 

Disk 1- Stop

Disk 2- Move Forward

Disk 3- Jump

Disk 4- Dash

No Disc- Free Rolling

[ Creators ]

Sam Feng - Programming - @samfenggames

Eizi Yu - Programming - https://eizimailcom.itch.io/

Jose Salas - Art & Designs - @salas_games

Franco Toledo - Music - @shawntrrttll

[ Note ]

A game made in two days by unSAME team for Mix and Game Jam 2020. A combination of Music Player/ Track Mixing  Simulator/ Rhythm game with Platformer.
